Title: Sample Changelog #2
introduction: This is a random paragraph that I am typing here to serve as a placeholder for the Changelog. The Changelog may have one or more than one paragraphs like this that compliments a new feature. Above this paragraph, there will alway be a snapshot of the new feature we shipped. Below these paragraphs, there will always be 3 sections: “New,” “Improved,” and “Fixed.”The 3 sections below use the TextButton component and is collapsed by default. The scrolling behavior should be referring to Linear’s.A sample Changelog will look just like this.

New.description: You can now do so many things with the dashboard.
Fixed weird UI bug where an icon disappeared was fixed.
Now you can run 50 models at the same time, side by side too.
Issue where backend was down for 5 days is resolved.
